website_summaries.verdict: Delivers excellent protection for wooden kitchen products in an easy-to-handle size.
pros: With this small 8-ounce squeeze bottle, you'll be able to handle it easily and store it in almost any cupboard
Prevents wooden utensils and cutting boards from soaking up food odors or water
cons: A little pricier per ounce than some other brands of mineral oil

customer_reviews.title: A MUST-HAVE HOUSEHOLD PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This GREAT for preserving my Blanco anthracite black sink. After cleaning, I rub a small amount of the food grade mineral oil into the surface, and it looks like new. It keeps it that way for a couple of weeks. It's also great to rub into cutting boards and on knife blades to prevent rust. GREAT product--great price!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Burton

customer_reviews.title: Clear directions and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My Bamboo cutting board and bamboo utensils look beautiful after a treatment with this Premium 100% Pure Food Grade Mineral Oil. The directions on the bottle are clear. Now I just have to remember to repeat the treatment every few months.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my butcher block nice and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my butcher block nice and shiny, looks great, no odor, and no taste transferred to the food. Does what its supposed to at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have a butcher block and smaller cutting boards, I have tried a few other mineral oils and been disappointed. 100% Pure Food Grade Mineral Oil USP is easy to apply and I would recommend this to anyone who needs to improve their wood cutting boards.
customer_reviews.author: Noni

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Decent price, I'm using this to protect my carbon knives so I can't really say as of yet how well it has worked but nothing is rusting on me so far. No smell and nice consistency.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on a new wood cutting board. It worked great and I will keep using it for any other project that I can use it on.
customer_reviews.author: joanie43

customer_reviews.title: It’s mineral oil
customer_reviews.text: Works well for sharpening my knife. Just wish that there was perhaps a squirt nozzle or something smaller than just the bottle cap type set up. I totally spilled it EVERYWHERE on the table on accident.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works great for wooden kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: Bought to treat my wooden rolling pins and cutting boards. Mineral oil is a thinner consistency. Found it easiest to pour into my hands to apply to my rolling pins. There's no smell and absorbs easily. I like that mineral oil doesn't go racid and has a really long shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: First time shopper for mineral oil
customer_reviews.text: I just got a really good wood cutting board and used this, seems like a good product, but it's the first time I used mineral oil.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I put on my scissors and they work great :)
customer_reviews.author: Tori68

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be organic so it will not bother your skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mineral oil to mix with my young living essential oil‘s and it worked awesome also I use that on all my wood cutting boards it keeps him nice and Sabel and new
customer_reviews.author: sonja m.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a wooden cutting board that had lots of bad water spots. This took them away and restored it to its original beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: There is no lid on this oil. How am I supposed to store a bottle of oil with no lid??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product; good value
customer_reviews.text: It is what it appears to be. Not much more to say. We use this monthly on our butcher block island.
customer_reviews.author: Vodil

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and it did what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear and odorless
customer_reviews.text: Very good product , used it on bamboo cutting board .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great for conditioning a bamboo counter top
customer_reviews.text: We used this oil to condition and maintain our bamboo top on a roll around prep cart in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Fulltime traveler

customer_reviews.title: Spray Bottle Please
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. This needs to be in a spray bottle because it's messy.
customer_reviews.author: Justachick

customer_reviews.title: Always and forever product to carry
customer_reviews.text: This product made my sink look brand new and shiny clean! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: No scent to this at all and makes everything very nice. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Venessa

customer_reviews.title: Received bottle with no top
customer_reviews.text: Ok what am I supposed to do with a bottle with no top?
customer_reviews.author: Anil Budram

customer_reviews.title: Good size bottle for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Worked as it should. Good size bottle for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: mjkusiek

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: Really great oil. I just wish the label gave recommended drying times between coats. I've been giving it 12 hours just to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish after applied
customer_reviews.text: Works well and soaks in nicely. Just what my butcher counter needed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C.

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board like new
customer_reviews.text: Easy application and the richness it brought to the wood of my cutting block.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny T.

customer_reviews.title: True oil
customer_reviews.text: Great for cutting boards and even used it for my stainless steel appliances
customer_reviews.author: Roseann S

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find in local stores...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to bring bamboo cutting boards back to life. Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a large cutting board and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good wood protector
customer_reviews.text: I like that it was easy to mix with beeswax for harder finish.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Almaraz

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: went on easy....used on wood cutting board....happy with results...light & clean product
customer_reviews.author: Rita Finan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked very good for my 27 year old butcher block I made in school.
customer_reviews.author: Tdrop

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always know I needed mineral oil for my cutting boards. But I didn’t know it could be used for mainting stainless steel knives as well. It works as expected. I’d definitely would but this again.
customer_reviews.author: Csantiago911

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, I use this product to clean and store my knives.
customer_reviews.author: Bernd Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for treating my handmade cutting boards. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great for wooden kitchen products
customer_reviews.text: Made my wooden cutting board and spoons look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I used this to recondition my wooden salad bowls. Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: More uses than just food!
customer_reviews.text: Somebody suggested I use mineral oil for all my make up needs and it did not disappoint! I’ve used it for dried out gels, any kind of sparkly gel eyeshadow , and to remove make up! Where have you been all of my life???
customer_reviews.author: Riven

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaked in shipping
customer_reviews.text: It's mineral oil. No surprises there. Product itself is fine. However, the **bottle leaked** during shipping so I'm taking off two stars. It was not sealed when I got it. It made a mess of the shipping box and the three other items inside. I'm actually surprised UPS didn't pull the box for inspection with a big oil stain all down one side.
customer_reviews.author: J. St Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Our wooden salad bowls say "Yay!"
customer_reviews.text: In the past, we used olive oil to "season" our salad bowls, but on occasion, it would start to go rancid, requiring a thorough wash, dry and then re-seasoning. Stumbled over a couple of google sources recommending the use of mineral oil. The food grade stuff is non-toxic (some even use it as a laxative!) So once a month, we spread a couple of drops on the inside of the bowls, and let it soak in. We don't drink the stuff straight....
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to restore my very old and very used cutting board. After giving it a light sanding I covered it with the mineral oil and let it let overnight then gave it second coat the next morning. It looks amazing now and I'll use the mineral oil on a regular basis to preserve my cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great as sewing Machine Oil
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a lubricant for my Juki sewing machine but also use it on my cutting boards. Pure. Scent free. Great packaging.
customer_reviews.author: julie NC

customer_reviews.title: Great for conditioning cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil to condition my wood cutting boards. It is easy to spread and has a very subtle scent.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff for dry wood instruments,guitar,violin etc.😁
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff,I use it for my dry instruments. No real smell and is easy to apply,and it leaves no nasty residue.Thanks
customer_reviews.author: jmangi62

customer_reviews.title: Good for conditioning my granite composite sink~
customer_reviews.text: I like this mineral oil, will use it to condition/brighten my granite composite sink instead of good olive oil!
customer_reviews.author: Paisley Woodstock

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. I used them on some bamboo cutting boards I had purchased. Easy to use, quakity seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know I needed this till I started using it
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my knives and scissors sharp and waterspot free. I also use it to restore wooden spoons and cutting boards.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the job although I need to oil the board again and I just did a few days ago when I got the oil. I kind of thought it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Will buy again when I run out. Does as described and makes all my cutting boards look baeutiful! Bamboo and wood alike
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Like others, I bought it for a cutting board ...
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I bought it for a cutting board i made. Does what it needs to. Just not a ton in this size bottle.
customer_reviews.author: C.Will

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. Purchased to seal a wood pasta ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Purchased to seal a wood pasta drying rack. Was my first purchase of mineral oil, but I think this is a decent amount for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not mold. One of the very few food grade oils that does not mold.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence W Smith

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: Mineral oil, not much to say. It works and is odorless.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin Zane

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered. Work well on the bread ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Work well on the bread board.
customer_reviews.author: TEJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to condition some old cutting boards I had.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product areibed in perfect conditions and it was what I expected. Consistency just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Iglesias

product_meta.title: Premium 100% Pure Food Grade Mineral Oil USP, 8 ounces, NSF Approved, Butcher Block and Cutting Board Oil
product_meta.description:
* 8 ounces of 100% food grade mineral oil USP certified and NSF approved (certificate available upon request)
 * Food safe, prevents growth of bacteria and absorption of food odors
 * Colorless/odorless, helps keep food products fresh and crisp
 * Some of the many uses include butcher block oil, cutting board oil, wood stain, soapstone oil, lubricator, laxative and bamboo oil
 * Proudly made in the USA
feature_bullets: Great for butcher blocks, wood utensils, cutting boards and more
Easy to pour, easy to store bottle
